name: Private Arsenal
desc: A secure facility that grants access to all weapons and fighter wings discovered by the player's faction. Available only on player-owned colonies, it provides a private arms market without affecting the local economy.\nThis industry unlocks a special submarket where you can buy all the weapons and fighters you have unlocked.

name: Reverse Engineering Hub I
desc: A high-tech facility dedicated to analyzing and reproducing advanced technology through reverse engineering. By deconstructing recovered items, it allows for the creation of blueprints to expand your faction's capabilities.
